experiences.title: Software Engineer
description: Work with other SDEs to design and implement code solution to improve the efficiency of the Amazon Last Mile Delivery system.
Research and document system's readiness for peak season (i.e. Amazon Prime Day, Thanksgiving, and Christmas) based on holiday forecast.
Provide 24/7 support during on-call rotation. This includes troubleshooting unforeseen problems with current services, maintaining hosts, and fixing CI/CD pipelines.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Enhance security measures of Nimble OS SDK by adding new features that support different types of users.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Worked on the voice assistant module; build functions to respond to users' voice input.
Implement JWT creation and verification on the security module.
